MappingFields.Name: UserName
MappingFields.Description:
[Required] The user's username.  
This is typically the UserPrincipalName or EmployeeId.

**Note:** Used as both the Correlation Key and Value, as well as the AccountReference. The ID is the primary AccountReference, but the username is also included as a backup and serves as an additional AccountReference.

MappingFields.Name: Manager
MappingFields.Description:
[Optional] The manager's ID for the user. This field is read-only.

**Note:** This uses a None mapping because the value is calculated in the scripts. We can only assign a manager who exists in Zenya and was created by HelloID. HelloID must first grant the Account entitlement to the manager.

MappingFields.Name: ExternalId
MappingFields.Description: [Required] The employee identifier assigned to the user by the organization.

MappingFields.Name: Id
MappingFields.Description:
[Required] The user's ID. This field is read-only.

**Note:** This uses a None mapping because the value is calculated in the scripts. It is used as the AccountReference.

MappingFields.Name: Emails
MappingFields.Description:
[Required] The user's email addresses. This must be of the type Array.

**Note:** Currently, only the work email address is supported in the format: 'work:' + <mail>.

MappingFields.Name: Department
MappingFields.Description:
[Optional] The user's department.

**Note:** We can only assign departments that already exist in Zenya, and each department must have a unique name (matching is done by name only). Department maintenance, including creation, deletion, and setting the owner, must be managed in Zenya.
